title: burn the witch
description: Those who live in Reverse London can see supernatural creatures like dragons. Noel and Nini work to help promote coexistence between these creatures and humans, but sometimes they must undergo missions to exterminate these creatures.
The story takes place in a world of anthropomorphic animals with a cultural divide between carnivores and herbivores.

title: promised neverland
description: Three children live happily at Grace Field House orphanage until an unexpected twist changes everything, the boys accidentally learning the cruel reality of their existence. Therefore, the three begin to rebel and fight as much as they can in a dark adventure.

title: jujutsu kaisen
description: The story revolves around the student Yūji Itadori, who joins a secret organization of sorcerers to kill a powerful curse called Ryōmen.

title: pokemon
description: Learn about the adventures of Red and Blue through the Kanto region. They will seek to defeat the 8 gym leaders and become champions of the Pokémon League while Team Rocket commits their criminal acts with the Pokémon.
